title: Provides a mental hygiene legal service to certain patients or residents of residential healthcare facilities
summary: Provides a mental hygiene legal service to patients or residents of residential healthcare facilities who have been admitted directly from a facility and who have a chronic mental illness and are receiving services related to such illness.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to providing a mental hygiene legal service to certain patients or residents of residential healthcare facilities
